title: Tales from the Borderlands Episode 5
description:
Title: Tales from the Borderlands 
Genre: Adventure 
Publisher: Telltale Games	
Release Date: 20 Oct, 2015 
Language: English 

System Requirements: 
Minimum: 
OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 
Processor: Core 2 Duo 2GHz or equivalent 
Memory: 3 GB RAM 
Graphics: ATI or NVIDIA card w/512 MB RAM 
DirectX: Version 9.0c 
Hard Drive: 3 GB available space 
Sound Card: Direct X 9.0c sound device 
Additional Notes: Not Recommended for Intel integrated graphics 
 
About This Game 
Tales from the Borderlands is a five part episodic game series from the creators of The Wolf Among Us and The Walking Dead: A Telltale Games Series. Set on the unforgiving world of Pandora after the events seen in Borderlands 2, this is a story full of Borderlandsâ€™ trademark humor, following two adventurers on their quest for greatness. 

Youâ€™ll play as Rhys, a Hyperion â€˜suitâ€™ with dreams of being the next Handsome Jack, and Fiona, a Pandoran con artist looking to score her biggest ever swindle. Thrown together as unwilling partners in an adventure to recover cash they both think is theirs, their journey will take you on a wild ride where gangsters, bandit lords, and Vault Hunters are just some of the obstacles youâ€™ll encounter, in this new take on the award-winning universe created by Gearbox Software. 

â€¢ Play as Rhys, on a mission to make Hyperion his 
â€¢ Play as Fiona, on a mission to make the money hers (all of it) 
â€¢ Explore Pandora as never before: familiar and new locations brought to life as more than mere cannon fodder 
â€¢ Your choices matter, changing the story around you, and making the tale yours
